sys_script_email.name: ATAT Alert Email Payload Parser

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_email_f6ff9ae4474ab110ee827d7ba26d437f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>ATAT Alert Email Payload Parser</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {     
	const payload = JSON.parse(event.parm2);
	const portfolio = payload.portfolio;
	const taskOrder = payload.taskOrder;
	gs.info(JSON.stringify(payload));
	const subject = `ATAT Portfolio alert for "${portfolio}" - Task Order #${taskOrder}`;
	gs.info(subject);
	email.setSubject(subject);
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>stephen.hayes</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-10-19 19:28:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>f6ff9ae4474ab110ee827d7ba26d437f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ATAT Alert Email Payload Parser</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ATAT" source="x_g_dis_atat">f600233d1b154d507b782f84604bcb12</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ATAT">f600233d1b154d507b782f84604bcb12</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_f6ff9ae4474ab110ee827d7ba26d437f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>stephen.hayes</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-10-19 19:54:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
